TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GraphicsUnit extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica la unidad de medida de unos datos concretos.

span.span: Specifies the unit of measure for the given data.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo cargar un mapa de bits de un controlar, mediante la enumeración y el uso de la método para dibujar los límites del rectángulo de un mapa de bits.The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an handle, using the enumeration, and the use of the method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap. Este ejemplo está diseñado para usarse con formularios Windows Forms.This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. Crear un formulario que contenga un botón denominado Button2.Create a form that contains a button named Button2. Pegue el código en el formulario y asocie este método con el botón eventos.Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Display = int32(1)

summary.span: Especifica la unidad de medida del dispositivo de pantalla.

span.span: Specifies the unit of measure of the display device.

summary.span: Normalmente, píxeles para pantallas de vídeo y 1/100 de pulgada para impresoras.

span.span: Typically pixels for video displays, and 1/100 inch for printers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Document = int32(5)

summary.span: Especifica la unidad del documento (1/300 de pulgada) como unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies the document unit (1/300 inch) as the unit of measure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Inch = int32(4)

summary.span: Especifica que la pulgada es la unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies the inch as the unit of measure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Millimeter = int32(6)

summary.span: Especifica que el milímetro es la unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies the millimeter as the unit of measure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Pixel = int32(2)

summary.span: Especifica que un píxel de dispositivo es la unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies a device pixel as the unit of measure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit Point = int32(3)

summary.span: Especifica que un punto de la impresora (1/72 de pulgada) es la unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies a printer's point (1/72 inch) as the unit of measure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit World = int32(0)

summary.span: Especifica que la unidad del sistema de coordenadas universal sea la unidad de medida.

span.span: Specifies the world coordinate system unit as the unit of measure.
